docs.title: Truck dispatch
docs.description: We developed a comprehensive platform with automated dispatching, invoicing with alerts, IFTA reporting, lone worker safety monitoring, fleet management, route planning, and a load discovery feature to connect carriers with available loads efficiently.

children.text: Logistics companies face challenges in managing dispatch, invoicing, fleet optimization, and ensuring the safety of remote workers. Inefficient operations, empty miles, and compliance issues like IFTA reporting further complicate their processes, reducing productivity and profitability.

We developed a comprehensive logistics management system that automates dispatch, streamlines invoicing with alerts, tracks fuel usage for IFTA compliance, and includes a lone worker safety system. Additionally, it optimizes fleet management, route planning, and connects carriers with available loads, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and safety.
Dispatching Management automates scheduling, assignment, and tracking to improve efficiency.
Invoicing with Alerts generates invoices automatically and sends payment notifications, integrating with accounting systems.
IFTA Reporting tracks fuel usage and mileage for tax compliance.
The Lone Worker Safety System provides real-time monitoring and emergency alerts for remote workers.
Fleet and Logistics Manager optimizes vehicle management, route planning, and delivery scheduling.
Platform for Load Discovery connects carriers with available loads, improving operational efficiency and speed by reducing empty miles.

meta.title: Truck dispatch
meta.description: We developed a comprehensive platform with automated dispatching.

docs.title: Egistic
docs.description: We created a platform with remote management, event planning, equipment tracking, real-time monitoring, crop history storage, warehouse oversight, consultations, and data services.

children.text: Egistic needed a centralized farm management system to streamline complex agricultural operations, including equipment tracking, real-time monitoring, event planning, and data management.

We developed a comprehensive platform that enables remote farm management, event scheduling, equipment tracking, and real-time monitoring. The solution also includes crop history storage, warehouse operations oversight, agricultural consultations, and data-driven services, providing farmers with a seamless and efficient management tool.
: Control and monitor farm operations from a distance.
: Track the use of farm machinery.
: Monitor activities on the farm in real time.
: Maintain records of crop cultivation history.
: Utilize various data-driven services for farming.

docs.title: PortalTop
docs.description: A Spanish Real Estate Agency needed a portal for residential sales and rentals. We built a platform featuring 360 apartment views, area maps, agent management, CRM integration, client messaging, AWS storage, SEO, and ChatGPT consultant integration.

children.text: The goal was to create a comprehensive real estate portal that streamlined property sales and rentals, improved agent management, and enhanced user interaction. The platform needed to include advanced features like 360 apartment views, integration with external sources, CRM capabilities, and user-friendly navigation.

We developed a robust platform with a 360 apartment viewing experience, interactive area maps, and an agent management portal. Integrating with CRM and external sources, we enhanced asset management and client communication. The solution included SEO optimization, AWS cloud storage for scalability, and ChatGPT integration for instant client support, providing a seamless and efficient real estate management experience.

meta.title: PortalTop
meta.description: A Spanish Real Estate Agency needed a portal for residential sales and rentals. We built a platform featuring 360 apartment views, area maps, agent management, CRM integration, client messaging, AWS storage, SEO, and ChatGPT consultant integration.

docs.title: NYCity Blinds
docs.description: We developed a custom Progressive Web App (PWA) for iPads, allowing designers to digitally record measurements on-site. Integrated with their Zoho CRM, the system streamlined order processing, reduced errors, improved production time, and enhanced scalability.

children.text: , a company specializing in custom window shades, encountered inefficiencies in their order management process. Their designers used paper-based methods to record measurements during client visits, which led to frequent errors when transferring information from the designer to the manager and then to the manufacturer.

items.item_value: VPS with Git and Continuous Integration

children.text: The manual system for recording window measurements created a high risk of errors, leading to delays and requiring follow-up with clients to correct inaccuracies. Small mistakes in the process resulted in costly order errors, which slowed down production and impacted client satisfaction.

To address this, we developed a Progressive Web Application (PWA) designed specifically for iPads, allowing designers to digitally record measurements on-site. This replaced the outdated paper method and ensured data accuracy from the start.

The custom system was integrated with their existing Zoho CRM, which they used for order tracking. The new system allowed for automatic syncing of orders from the app to Zoho CRM, generating a PDF for each order. These PDFs contained all the necessary details and were sent directly to the manufacturers and vendors, streamlining the entire process.
By reducing manual steps and errors, the company saw improvements in production speed.
The digital system eliminated the need for manual data entry, minimizing mistakes in the order process.
The integration with Zoho CRM ensured that order tracking and communication between teams were more efficient.
With this new digital workflow, New York City Blinds is better positioned to scale their operations without sacrificing accuracy or speed.

meta.title: NYCity Blinds
meta.description: We developed a custom Progressive Web App (PWA) for iPads, allowing designers to digitally record measurements on-site. Integrated with their Zoho CRM, the system streamlined order processing, reduced errors, improved production time, and enhanced scalability.

docs.title: Truth or Dare Everyone Edition
docs.description: We developed Truth or Dare: Everyone Edition, a mobile app designed for both kids and adults, featuring a user-friendly interface, diverse questions, creative dares, and biweekly content updates. The app enhances family bonding and group fun, providing an engaging and seamless experience across all devices.

children.text: Our goal was to develop a mobile app that offers a fun and engaging "Truth or Dare" experience suitable for both children and adults. The app needed to have a clean, easy-to-use interface, regularly updated content, and interactive features that enhance group gatherings and family bonding.

We designed "Truth or Dare: Everyone Edition" with inclusivity in mind, ensuring it was accessible to all age groups. The app features a simple, intuitive interface that allows users to quickly engage in the game.
Development of a smooth, responsive interface for a seamless user experience.
Scalability, ensuring the app performs well across different devices and environments.

docs.title: Workloop
docs.description: We built a custom WordPress theme, implemented the provided design, and integrated WATI and vidCruiter APIs to automate WhatsApp messaging based on vidCruiter events.

children.text: We were tasked with building a custom WordPress website that matched the client’s design specifications. The project involved developing a unique theme from scratch and integrating APIs to automate WhatsApp messaging based on vidCruiter events. The result was a fully tailored and functional website that met the client's needs.
Create a custom website on WordPress CMS based on provided Web Design.
Create integration between WATI and vidCruiter APIs on the client's hosting.
Developed a custom WordPress Theme from scratch.
Implemented provided web design into page with pixel-perfect alignment.
Integrated WATI and vidCruiter APIs on client's hosting that allows to send WhatsApp messages triggered by vidCruiter events.
Adapted swiper.js into the design with user interactions. Built with Vanilla JavaScript.

meta.title: Workloop
meta.description: We built a custom WordPress theme, implemented the provided design, and integrated WATI and vidCruiter APIs to automate WhatsApp messaging based on vidCruiter events.
